input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to play with an angel oracle?
input_text.Response A:
Respect his wishes.
Define rules about phone and other e-contact.
Develop approaches for social interactions.
Reach an agreement.
Prevent outbursts.
Examine why.
Clarify finality.
Consider your compatibility.This may be an occasion when you are simply not compatible.
Let off some steam.
Work the process.
Determine the emotional need he fulfilled.
Appreciate the positive qualities and learning experiences.
Say goodbye.
Gain perspective.
Fight insecurities.
Build self-esteem through specific events.
Explore your options.
Seek professional help.
Renew your belief in healthy relationships.When you feel up to it, reaffirm that you believe in the possibility of having a healthy relationship.
Allow for sad moments.
Remind the world.
Welcome him back with conditions.
Be self-reliant.Happiness is an inside job and you are responsible to create it.
input_text.Response B:
Walk the way of truth and wisdom.
Get inner peace.
Stay on your path of truth and wisdom.
Share the abundance in your life with your people.
Strengthen your inner happiness.
Oh happy day.
Your path is blessed.
Make each day at least 5 minutes spiritual exercises.
Recognize yourself as a master of life.
Enter into a life in the light.

label_annotations.feedback: I thought both answers were hard to understand
